field.name: product1
field.label: Товар 1:
field.query: SELECT p.virtuemart_product_id as kys, concat(c.category_name,'-',p.product_name) as value FROM #__virtuemart_products_ru_ru as p LEFT JOIN #__virtuemart_product_categories as pc ON p.virtuemart_product_id=pc.virtuemart_product_id LEFT JOIN #__virtuemart_categories_ru_ru as c ON pc.virtuemart_category_id=c.virtuemart_category_id
